com.sensoro.beacon.core

接口 SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback

  • 封闭类:
    SensoroBeaconConnection

    public static interface SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback
    beacon相关回调函数接口
    callback interface of beacon

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onAcceleratorCountUpdate(Beacon beacon, int count)
      beacon加速度传感器次数发生变化时,自动回调
      auto callback when beacon acceleration sensor count changed
      void onAcceleratorMovingUpdate(Beacon beacon, int movingState)
      beacon加速度传感器运动状态发生变化时,自动回调
      auto callback when beacon acceleration sensor moving state changed
      void onBrightnessLuxDataUpdate(Beacon beacon, double brightnessLux)
      光线发生明显变化时,自动回调
      auto callback when light condition changed
      void onCheckPassword(Beacon beacon, int status)
      校验密码回调
      callback of modify check password
      void onConnectedState(Beacon beacon, int newState, int status)
      beacon连接状态回调
      callback of beacon connection state
      void onDisabledPassword(Beacon beacon, int status)
      关闭密码回调
      callback of disabled password
      void onResetAcceleratorCount(Beacon beacon, int status)
      重置加速度传感器计数器回调
      callback of reset acceleration sensor count
      void onResetToFactory(Beacon beacon, int status)
      恢复出厂设置回调
      callback of reset to factory
      void onSetBaseSetting(Beacon beacon, int status)
      修改beacon基础设置回调
      callback of modify base settings of beacon
      void onSetMajoMinor(Beacon beacon, int status)
      修改major和minor回调
      callback of modify major and minor
      void onSetNewPassword(Beacon beacon, int status)
      修改校验密码回调
      callback of modify
      void onSetProximityUUID(Beacon beacon, int status)
      修改proximityUUID回调
      callback of modify proximity UUID
      void onSetSensorSetting(Beacon beacon, int status)
      修改beacon传感器设置回调
      callback of modify sensor setting of beacon
      void onTemperatureDataUpdate(Beacon beacon, int temperature)
      温度发生变化时,自动回调
      auto callback when temperature condition changed
      void onUpdateSensorData(Beacon beacon, int status)
      更新传感器数据回调
      callback of update sensor date

    • 方法详细资料

      • onConnectedState

        void onConnectedState(Beacon beacon,
                    int newState,
                    int status)
        beacon连接状态回调
        callback of beacon connection state
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        newState - 返回beacon连接状态 CONNECTED 或者 DISCONNECTED。参见 Beacon.CONNECTED 和 Beacon.DISCONNECTED
        Return the new connection state of iBeacon. Can be one of CONNECTED or DISCONNECTED. See Beacon.CONNECTED and Beacon.DISCONNECTED
        status - 返回回调结果 SUCCESS 或者 FAILUER。参见 SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS 和 SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE
        Return the result of callback.Can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onSetNewPassword

        void onSetNewPassword(Beacon beacon,
                    int status)
        修改校验密码回调
        callback of modify
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        status - 返回回调结果 SUCCESS 或者 FAILUER。参见 SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS 和 SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE
        Return the result of callback.Can be one of SUCCESS or FAILURE. See SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS and SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onDisabledPassword

        current beacon
        status - 返回回调结果 SUCCESS 或者 FAILUER。参见 SensoroBeaconConnection.SUCCESS 和 SensoroBeaconConnection.FAILURE

      • onTemperatureDataUpdate

        void onTemperatureDataUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                           int temperature)
        温度发生变化时,自动回调
        auto callback when temperature condition changed
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        temperature - beacon的环境温度
        temperature of environment condition

      • onBrightnessLuxDataUpdate

        void onBrightnessLuxDataUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                             double brightnessLux)
        光线发生明显变化时,自动回调
        auto callback when light condition changed
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        brightnessLux - beacon的环境光线
        light of environment condition

      • onAcceleratorMovingUpdate

        void onAcceleratorMovingUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                             int movingState)
        beacon加速度传感器运动状态发生变化时,自动回调
        auto callback when beacon acceleration sensor moving state changed
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        movingState - beacon的运动状态
        current moving state of beacon

      • onAcceleratorCountUpdate

        void onAcceleratorCountUpdate(Beacon beacon,
                            int count)
        beacon加速度传感器次数发生变化时,自动回调
        auto callback when beacon acceleration sensor count changed
        参数:
        beacon - 当前连接的beacon
        current beacon
        count - beacon移动的次数
        moving count of beacon
